title: Kirk Minihane Takes the Boys to Miltons
description:
Kirk Minihane was delighted to take Blind Mike and Steve Robinson to Miltons at Chestnut Hill for a little clothes shopping and shop talk. There's nothing he enjoys more than spending time outside of the studio with his dedicated team of professionals. Well, he might enjoy breaking down Willie Colon's appearance on Good Morning America more.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
